summary: Lt. Thomas Glahn and Edvarda fall in love, but love can turn to hate.
cast: Lasse Kolsrud|Sofie Gråbøl|Bjørn Sundquist|Anneke von der Lippe|Per Schaanning|Peter Striebeck|Shaun Lawton|Claudia Malkovich|Bernhard Ramstad|Bjørn Jenseg|Wiggo Lebsanft|Ragnhild Hilt|Bjørn Stein|Mai Lise Rasmussen|Torunn Lødemel|Regine Hamsun|Marit Andreassen
title: Pan
